subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Riley Skinner threw a 7-yard touchdown pass to D. J. Boldin with 5 minutes 28 seconds left to help No. 21 Wake Forest beat Clemson, 12-7, on Thursday night in Winston-Salem, N.C.
snippet: Riley Skinner threw a 7-yard touchdown pass to D. J. Boldin with 5 minutes 28 seconds left to help No. 21 Wake Forest beat Clemson, 12-7, on Thursday night in Winston-Salem, N.C.
